Acquisition.description: Activate and control Antennas, control the Tech Coffin!

Biotechvore.description: Try not to die to the BTV Zone or your enemy, and get ready to do classifieds!

Capture and Protect.description: Capture the Flag, but with guns!

Countermeasures.description: Accomplish Current Mission Objectives from a pool of randomly selected Classifieds!

Decapitation.description: Hope you didn't go to officer training, cuz otherwise you're on the menu. Kill more Lieutenants!

Firefight.description: Kill more specialists! And Lieutenants! And army points. And maybe grab some loot?

Frostbyte.description: Kill more army points, dominate the exclusion zone, and don't freeze to death!

Frontline.description: Hold the zones, more points the closer you get to the enemy DZ!

Highly Classified.description: Perform more Main Classified Objectives than the enemy from the pool of 4!

Mindwipe.description: Discover and destroy the enemy server containing the rogue AI!

Panic Room.description: Hold the panic room at the end of each game round! Don't die!

Supplies.description: Control supply boxes at the end of the game!

The Armory.description: Dominate the Armory, and loot around!

Unmasking.description: Reveal and kill the enemy Designated Target!

Narrative Mission / BAMS.description: Deliberate among yourselves, shoot a steindrage maybe

Battleground.description: Control 3 horizontal zones, kill the enemy Key Ops!

Cutthroat.description: Kill enemy lieutenants! Also use your Key Ops to kill people.

Superiority.description: Dominate more quadrants! Hack Consoles! Use a Key Ops to secure the zone!

Uplink Center.description: Activate and control Communication Antennas/Tech Coffins! Keep your LT alive!
